code: public void testPendingTasksWithBlocks() {     createIndex("test").     ensureGreen("test").     // This test checks that the Pending Cluster Tasks operation is never blocked, even if an index is read only or whatever.     for (String blockSetting : Arrays.asList(SETTING_BLOCKS_READ, SETTING_BLOCKS_WRITE, SETTING_READ_ONLY, SETTING_BLOCKS_METADATA, SETTING_READ_ONLY_ALLOW_DELETE)) {         try {             enableIndexBlock("test", blockSetting).             PendingClusterTasksResponse response = client().admin().cluster().preparePendingClusterTasks().execute().actionGet().             assertNotNull(response.getPendingTasks()).         } finally {             disableIndexBlock("test", blockSetting).         }     }     try {         setClusterReadOnly(true).         PendingClusterTasksResponse response = client().admin().cluster().preparePendingClusterTasks().execute().actionGet().         assertNotNull(response.getPendingTasks()).     } finally {         setClusterReadOnly(false).     } }
